fullText: David Henry Hwang's new play is a shrewd and entertaining comedy about the clash of cultures and languages that occurs when an American businessman tries to make a deal in China.
dtliExcerpt: David Henry Hwang's new play is a shrewd and entertaining comedy about the clash of cultures and languages that occurs when an American businessman tries to make a deal in China.
